summary: When U.S. Coast Guard service members are injured or ill, the Coast Guard determines their fitness for duty and eligibility for benefits through its disability evaluation system. The Coast Guard is in the process of updating this system. In this Q&A we looked at how the Coast Guard administers this system and its process for updating it. We found that many cases faced delays. The...
title: Coast Guard: Monitoring of Disability Evaluation System Could Be Improved
